Okay so I admit I'm necroing the thread, but I figured it's better than making another one to talk about the same thing. Anyway, I've been on 0.23 since it came out, and I haven't seen this thing one single time. Ever. Not even in the older versions from before 0.23.

I'm 100% sure I saw it in 0.22. I'm not paying much attention to the menu screen now but supposedly the chance to get the castle is somewhere around 1:40 so you just need to keep running KSP and it should eventually show up.

From the Wiki

"One of the two main menu images is that of a Kerbal standing on the Mun's surface, with Kerbin in the background. There is a 1 in 40 chance that a sand castle made of Mun dust can be seen at his feet."
I used to see it a lot, but not a lot now for some reason.

I used to see it a lot, but not a lot now for some reason.

One of possible reasons is that when you end a game now, it brings you to the second page of the menu instead of the first one as it used to and even if the dust castle is there on the first page, you won't go there to see it before loading another save.
